attributes.contentHtml:
just because its a host in the works doesnt give you permission to not have a privacy policy (tos isnt required but without a tos, you are essentially saying users can do wtf they want).

if anything is released to even a couple of people, legal documents are required.

(when i mean anything, i literally mean it. for example, you need to license your code if you want to collaborate with anyone else or else no one will own it including you, even if you were the person who first started creating it.)

attributes.bio: drama.gg sucks but I guess here I am.

attributes.title: Scam Bot Hosting (Source Code Stealing) and Blocking me for asking for help
